decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations, pertaining to the roof extensions, would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (Amendment) (No. 2) (England) Order 2008 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations, pertaining to the front rooflights, would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (Amendment) (No. 2) (England) Order 2008 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The development is only just within Permitted Development tolerances in terms of volume.  You are advised to complete the development in full accordance with the plans, as if the development is larger than that covered by this Certificate a breach of planning control could result.
description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE FOR A PROPOSED HIP TO GABLE & REAR ROOF EXTENSION WITH JULIET BALCONY AND 2 X ROOFLIGHTS TO FRONT ROOF SLOPE.
